allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add global location filter and CSV export with score filtering

- Implemented location filter supporting US states \(full names and abbreviations\), countries, and cities using country-converter and us libraries
- Added minimum score filter \(0-100, intervals of 5\) with dynamic UI updates
- Created CSV export functionality with Excel HYPERLINK formulas for clickable Lever and LinkedIn profile links
- Added two download options: filtered results and all results
- Location normalization handles partial matches and international locations
- All changes portable for Render deployment

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
